import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import ContainerDefault from "~/components/layouts/ContainerDefault"; import HeaderDashboard from "~/components/shared/headers/HeaderDashboard"; import { connect, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { toggleDrawerMenu } from "~/store/app/action"; import { addProduct } from "~/store/product/action"; const CreateProductPage = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(toggleDrawerMenu(false)); }, []); const submitProduct = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(e.target.product) console.log("product submitted"); const product = { name: e.product.value, description: e.description.value, category: e.category.value, price: e.price.value, features: { width: e.width.value, height: e.height.value, color: e.color.value, weigth: e.weight.value, }, images: { main: e.image.value, }, }; dispatch(addProduct(product)); }; return (
{/* PRODUCT IMAGE */}
{/* PRODUCT FEATURES */} {/* */}
Back {/* */}
); }; export default connect((state) => state.app)(CreateProductPage);
